name.baseName: Wood pulp to make paper;copy paper

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The purpose of the life cycle assessment study of wood pulp production of copy paper is to quantify the resource consumption and environmental impacts behind the production of 1t of copy paper from wood pulp, which is divided into four parts: pulping, paper copying, transport, and waste treatment.
进行木浆生产复印纸生命周期评价研究的目的是为了量化木浆生产 1t 复印纸背后产生的资源消耗和环境影响，工艺过程分为制浆、抄纸、运输、三废处理四部分。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set representing wood pulp paper production for copy paper is used to quantify the resource consumption and environmental impact associated with the production of 1 ton of copy paper. The process is relevant for life cycle assessment studies and includes pulp making, paper forming, transportation, and waste treatment as its major components. Copy paper produced using wood pulp technology is significant within the paper production industry in Shandong Province, highlighting its importance and representativeness for such studies. The high standards for hardness and brightness in copy paper production justify the selection of wood pulp processes over others.
木浆纸生产数据集用于量化1吨复印纸生产所涉及的资源消耗与环境影响。该数据对于进行生命周期评价研究尤为重要，包括的主要工艺环节有制浆、抄纸、运输和三废处理。在山东省的造纸产业中，采用木浆工艺生产的复印纸所占比重重要，且由于复印纸对硬度和亮度的高要求，此种生产工艺被视为更具典型性和代表性。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data sources of this paper are, on the one hand, in-depth field research of major paper-making enterprises in Shandong Province to obtain first-hand information, and on the other hand, reviewing the annual statements of major paper-making enterprises in Shandong Province, the China Paper Yearbook and the annual report of the China Paper Association, as well as relevant literature and other means.
本文的数据来源一方面是深入山东省主要造纸企业进行实地调研获取第一 手资料，另一方面是查阅山东主要造纸企业年度报表、中国造纸年鉴和中国造纸 协会年报以及相关的文献资料等手段来获得。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 葛振香. 基于LCA的山东省造纸业可持续发展研究. (山东师范大学, 2017).
葛振香. 基于LCA的山东省造纸业可持续发展研究. (山东师范大学, 2017).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set for life cycle assessment of wood pulp paper production for copy paper, care should be taken to account for all chemistries involved in the pulping and paper-making processes, regardless of their quantities. While typical cutoff thresholds for considering chemicals in assessments are those which mass over 1%, this data set includes all available chemical data, even for those substances used in minor quantities with significant environmental impact. This approach minimizes errors and provides a more comprehensive view of the process. It is recommended that users verify the relevance and timeliness of the data, especially given the potential variance in processes and environmental factors. Any updates on production methods or environmental regulations should be considered.
使用该数据集进行木浆纸生产生命周期评价时，应详细考虑制浆和造纸过程中所有化学品，无论它们的用量大小。虽然标准的截流原则通常是考虑质量超过1%的化学品，但此数据集包含所有可获得的化学数据，即使是那些使用量小但对环境有重大影响的物质。这种方法最大限度地减少了误差，提供了一个更全面的过程视角。建议用户核实数据的相关性和时效性，特别是鉴于生产过程和环境因素的潜在变化。应考虑任何生产方法或环保法规的更新。

completeness.common:other: Combined with the relevant foreign research on the pulp and paper production process chemicals are usually greater than 1% by mass as a trade-off principle, but in fact some of the chemicals used in very small quantities in their own production process has a great impact on the environment. Due to the difficulty of obtaining data, all available chemical data were analysed in this paper to minimise errors.
结合国外相关研究对制浆、 造纸过程中的化学品通常以质量大于 1%为取舍原则，但事实上一些用量很少的 化学品在自身的生产过程中对环境的影响很大。由于数据获取难度较大，所以本 文将所有可获得的化学品数据都进行了分析，以此来最大范围内缩小误差；

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
